synopsis:
In the world of constant black rain, people live under umbrellasâ€™ protection. One day a man threw his umbrella away, which resulted to brought him a green plant, only existing green in that world. People desire his plant and start to scramble for it.

1st year work 2016 by Wenrui Huang, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)
